abilities.description: Allows the user to manipulate heat up to temperatures of 10,000 degrees Celsius.
Can burn anything the user touches.
Can make whatever the user touches melt into a liquid state.
Can use steam jets for flight and rapid movement.
Can create protective barriers made of intense heat.
User is immune to extreme temperatures, both hot and cold.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

keyMoments.description: Don Accino is revealed to possess the Atsu Atsu no Mi, which allows him to maintain Lovely Land's tropical climate despite the frozen surroundings.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Don Accino as a formidable Devil Fruit user with extreme temperature-based powers.

trivia.fact: The Atsu Atsu no Mi allows Don Accino to reach temperatures of 10,000 degrees, making him one of the most extreme temperature-based Devil Fruit users in the series.
This Devil Fruit is non-canon, appearing only in the anime-original Ice Hunter arc.
